DescriptionFormatTextId.SourceString: Text_When you deal damage to a target, cause a death flower to bloom. After 3 have bloomed, the death blossoms explode, dealing <Exec.MagicalDamageBase>[0] #</>.
DescriptionFormatTextId.LocalizedString: When you deal damage to a target, cause a death flower to bloom. After 3 have bloomed, the death blossoms explode, dealing <Exec.MagicalDamageBase>[0] _</>.
